alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 8:42PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Custer, central Blaine, west central Butte and northwestern Lincoln Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 841 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Bellevue to 8 miles northeast of Richfield. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Carey, Little Wood Reservoir, Picabo, Bellevue, Richfield, Gannett, Shoshone Ice Caves, and Garfield Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
